sentences: Olen mõtlesin pärast seda alati kurbaks.
Ma ei mõtlesid, et see kestaks nii kaua.
Mina siis mõtlesin, et ta on tark ruttu.
context: 'mõtlesin' is the past tense first person singular of 'to think'. It's used to express that someone was thinking about something in the past. Commonly appears in narratives and personal reflections when recounting thoughts or decisions made previously.
